Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is flexible since I can ask for feedback anytime I need (i.e. near the deadline). And I can the only part I need without getting out of context (sometimes teacher do). It makes me more effective in doing my assessment, especially near the deadline.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The clarity from teacher is preferable than GenAI since the teacher have better understanding on the assessment & rubric itself.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
